name: mira
text: I remember asking my friend from HK to translate for me.

name: prius_chaser
text: What was the translation?

name: mira
text: The first one is "hello" and the second one was like "writing" or something like that

name: notself
text: This is the best Achewood strip ever created.

name: deimosrising
text: It's "ji" in the fourth tone, the meaning is closest to "record" or "write for memory's sake"

name: boswelljn
text: a whole new level of props and respect for Onstad.

name: spinynorman
text: His wife is Chinese, or so an alt text claimed.

name: abreez_e
text: It's in traditional chinise, too, not simplified.

name: abreez_e
text: ...or even Chinese.

name: belgand
text: Given the demographics of the bay area I would say that is quite possible. I believe it's roughly a 1 in 3 chance. Palo Alto may be an outlier, however, due to the college.

name: layzerblade
text: I met her at an event. She looks white, but you never know.

name: lolsworth
text: They're taking the piss with that damn language.

name: mortshire
text: haha! when i was in germany all the little kids would test their cusses on me first!  "you like, butt shit?" children, love 'em!

name: tekende
text: LOVE THEM

name: cpnglxynchos
text: MOIST

name: mystkmanat
text: I'm staying away from all these moist, German children.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: I was declared medically dead after reading this for the first time.

name: invidious
text:
Excellent comment.

I love how the three blank panels setup the last one; we see Ultra-Peanut writing, we see Philippe's look of dismay, then we see what she wrote: "snoopys balls." To an adult reader, wonderfully representative of a five-year-old's typical insult; to a fellow five-year-old like Philippe, this was probably more distressing than the most graphic longshoreman's curse.

name: gunsofray
text: Apparently, 15 people liked your death so far.

name: deancain29
text: I had to leave the office because I was crying with laughter after this.

name: epicurus
text: I love this so much. What the fuck would you do if that was the first thing someone tried to communicate to you? I love it.

name: swatson
text: "High Five!"

name: lux
text: That Pikachu is not giving the other Pikachu a high-five!

name: cpnglxynchos
text: he's trying....missing obscenely...but trying!!

name: greenkoolayd
text: that is a common pikachu greeting.

name: ceokasen
text: I, personally, would inform the gentlemen or lady in question that my hovercraft is full of eels.

name: deusoma
text: The Tobacconist's? Down the street and to the right.

name: epicurus
text: I'm imagining a pretty shitty first contact with an alien species.

name: hollis
text: Why is Ultra Peanut so mean?

name: godfatherofsouls
text: because she's extremely cool is all

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "the foreign language textbook"

name: f1shst1ck
text: Of all the things to write down...

name: stuart
text: "Snoopy's balls" has become my go-to term for something poorly done, ie. "ProjectFun is totally snoopy's balls."

name: ssddr
text: What about digipen?

name: stuart
text:
WHAT ABOUT IT??

I know that you left, SSDDR.

name: quarantine
text: Ultra Peanut could teach Lyle a few things about swearing.

name: hypoluxa
text: Phillipe's face in panel 9 is priceless.

name: kelsotimebomb
text: Seconded.

name: molesticide
text:
imported japanese girls are actually kind of like this. they love to swear, are unbearably cute, like to take swings at the police, etc.

i have only known two imported japanese girls, but they were both like this.

name: ovenface
text: and yet, this is a chinese girl.

name: ford
text: I like that you say imported twice, like an old-timey dude who wants it known that they come in a box.

name: tekende
text: And due to their imported status they cost more on Amazon.com.

name: farqussus
text: they have previously unreleased material on them.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
ho damn!
chubbed.

name: kikineko
text: Aww, that is precious.  Philippe looks very adorable in the tie!

name: mikeronomicon
text: I freakin' love Ultra Peanut, but this is one of those strips where the comments made me laugh harder than the strip did. Assetbarians, you rock my socks.

name: carlyle
text: She looks so hopefully expectant I could drop kick an infant.
